article: gold prices tumbled thursday as weaker energy prices and a slight rise in the u.s. dollar prompted investors to pull back from the safe-haven metal and book profits after months of sharp gains .
abstract: gold prices shed more than $ ## an ounce as us dollar rebounds energy prices slump
